reviewText: Great DVD from Playboy!!!!  I still have this stashed away on VHS and was glad to find this again. The women in this are beautiful. But my favorite is Griffin in the Mike High Club.

There are several vignettes in this video I've owned for years. One of my favorite scenes has Griffin Drew (aka Raquel Cristal in "Playboy Special Editions") and a man joining the "Mile High Club" by doing the deed in the restroom of an airplane in flight. My other favorite has Korean Shayna Lee joining a couple in making love on a rooftop. Most of the scenes are at least OK, but these are my personal favorites.

OK, let's set the record straight.  There's no scenes with Great Danes, electric chairs, or any of that nonsense.  "Dangerous" here means "someplace where you might get caught".  This includes at the gym, out in public, etc.  They have real-life interviews with the couples before their episode.  Keep your finger on the fast-forward button here, they are not worth the time.  However, the sex is pretty good for a Playboy vid and the women are attractive.  Worth the watch.

Okay, this flick was good for a playboy movie...however it was boring. Plus, there was nothing "dangerous" about the sex. Plus the sex was terrible and considering that these people were supposed to be  "couples" the sex looked fake. Don't waste your time or money on  this one. Also, i use the word sex sparingly, because there was more  kissing than anything else.
